## `no function reassignment`

### `0`

```
✔ No known problems!

```

### `0: formatted`

```
function foo() {
	var foo = bar;
}

```

```
✔ No known problems!

```

### `1: formatted`

```

	foo = bar;
}

```

  ✖ Do not reassign a function declaration.

    function foo() { var foo; foo = bar; }
                              ^^^
